reviewText: I rate this movie 5 stars. Problem is, I'm rating my old VHS tape. WHY IS THIS NOT AVAILABLE ON BLU RAY? This story just pulls you in, kind of a magical/mystical story. If you are lucky, you may someday get to see it.
Would really like to see "Last of the Dogmen" on DVD for U.S. region.
Why is that no one is releasing this these movies on dvd anymore? Last of the Dogmen is a fabulous and very saught after movie. Who makes the DVD's for sale? What company can make more of these?
